meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are the same, so this can mean <vocabulary>lump</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>mass</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>bundle</vocabulary>. Additionally, this can also refer to being the <vocabulary>embodiment</vocabulary> of something. When somebody or something is a mass or bundle of some attribute or trait, they might as well be the embodiment of it!
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. Recognize this word? Na naaa na na na na na na naaa ♬.
